name: claude-setup
description: Professional command templates and tools for structured AI-assisted development with Claude Code

scripts.validate: echo 'Validating command templates...' && find .claude/commands -name '*.md' -exec echo 'Checking {}' \; -exec head -5 {} \;
scripts.hygiene:quick: npm run lint:check && npm run test:check && npm run markdown:lint && npm run git:status:summary
scripts.hygiene:full: npm run lint:check && npm run test:check && npm run deps:check && npm run git:status:full && npm run maintain:summary
scripts.commit:check: npm run lint:check --silent && npm run test:check --silent && npm run markdown:lint --silent && npm run feature:check --silent
scripts.lint:check: if [ -f 'eslint.config.js' ] || [ -f '.eslintrc.js' ]; then npx eslint . --max-warnings 10 2>/dev/null || echo '❌ Lint issues found'; else echo '⚠️ No linter configured'; fi
scripts.test:check: if grep -q '"test"' package.json 2>/dev/null; then npm test 2>/dev/null || echo '❌ Tests failing'; else echo '⚠️ No tests configured'; fi
scripts.quality:all: npm run lint:check && npm run test:check && npm run feature:check
scripts.quality:pre-commit: npm run lint:check --silent && npm run test:check --silent && npm run feature:check --silent && npm run git:check:staged
scripts.git:status:summary: echo "Branch: $(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') | Changes: $(git status --porcelain | wc -l | xargs) files"
scripts.git:check:staged: test -n "$(git diff --cached --name-only)" && echo '✅ Files staged' || (echo '❌ No staged files' && exit 1)
scripts.deps:check: npm outdated --depth=0 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ All dependencies up to date'
scripts.deps:audit: npm audit --audit-level=high 2>/dev/null || echo '✅ No high severity vulnerabilities'
scripts.maintain:largest: find . -name '*.js' 2>/dev/null | grep -v node_modules | xargs wc -l 2>/dev/null | sort -rn | head -5
scripts.maintain:summary: echo "Files: $(npm run maintain:files --silent) | Debt markers: $(grep -r 'TODO\|FIXME' --exclude-dir=node_modules . 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
scripts.test:results: npm test 2>&1 | tee test-results.log && echo "✅ Test results saved to test-results.log"
scripts.test:tap: node --test --test-reporter=tap test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js > test-results.tap 2>&1 && echo "✅ TAP results saved to test-results.tap"
scripts.// Services: === Local service management (models start UNLOADED, use /load endpoint to load) ===
scripts.services:start: uv run python services/llm_service.py & uv run python services/vlm_service.py & uv run python services/flux_service.py
scripts.services:gpu-tests:results: ENABLE_GPU_TESTS=1 node --test --test-concurrency=1 test/integration/gpu-coordination.test.js 2>&1 | tee gpu-test-results.log && echo "✅ GPU test results saved to gpu-test-results.log"
scripts.services:role-tests:results: ENABLE_GPU_TESTS=1 node --test --test-concurrency=1 test/integration/service-role-verification.test.js 2>&1 | tee role-test-results.log && echo "✅ Role test results saved to role-test-results.log"
scripts.quality:ci: npm run lint:check && npm test && npm run docs validate
scripts.ci:pre-push: npm run quality:ci && npm run git:unpushed
scripts.stats:project: echo "JS Files: $(npm run maintain:files --silent) | Commits: $(git rev-list --count HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo '0') | Branch: $(git branch --show-current)"

author: Rebecca Murphey
